psalm.title: Psalms
psalm.text:
[[Ps 95,1]]Come, let us sing joyfully to the LORD; 
let us acclaim the Rock of our salvation.
[[Ps 95,2]]Let us come into his presence with thanksgiving; 
let us joyfully sing psalms to him.

[[Ps 95,3]]For the LORD is a great God, 
And a great king above all gods;
[[Ps 95,4]]In his hands are the depths of the earth, 
And the tops of the mountains are his.
[[Ps 95,5]]His is the sea, for he has made it, 
And the dry land, which his hands have formed.

[[Ps 95,6]]Come, let us bow down in worship; 
let us kneel before the LORD who made us.
[[Ps 95,7]]For he is our God, 
and we are the people he shepherds, the flock he guides.

gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
gospel.text:
[[Lc 21,34]]Jesus said to his disciples: "Beware that your hearts do not become drowsy from carousing and drunkenness and the anxieties of daily life, and that day catch you by surprise
[[Lc 21,35]]like a trap. For that day will assault everyone who lives on the face of the earth.
[[Lc 21,36]]Be vigilant at all times and pray that you have the strength to escape the tribulations that are imminent and to stand before the Son of Man."

first_reading.title: Book of Revelation
first_reading.text:
[[Ap 22,1]]John said: An angel showed me the river of life-giving water, sparkling like crystal, flowing from the throne of God and of the Lamb
[[Ap 22,2]]down the middle of its street. On either side of the river grew the tree of life that produces fruit twelve times a year, once each month; the leaves of the trees serve as medicine for the nations.
[[Ap 22,3]]Nothing accursed will be found there anymore. The throne of God and of the Lamb will be in it, and his servants will worship him.
[[Ap 22,4]]They will look upon his face, and his name will be on their foreheads.
[[Ap 22,5]]Night will be no more, nor will they need light from lamp or sun, for the Lord God shall give them light, and they shall reign forever and ever.
[[Ap 22,6]]And he said to me, "These words are trustworthy and true, and the Lord, the God of prophetic spirits, sent his angel to show his servants what must happen soon."
[[Ap 22,7]]"Behold, I am coming soon." Blessed is the one who keeps the prophetic message of this book.
